creator: philip.thatcher@anite.com
text:
Right clicking on a JDBC sampler doesn’t allow assertions to be added as child
nodes.  This could simply be a bug in the menu definition.

Workaround:
I created an HTTP sampler, and a child “duration assertion”, and dragged in
under the JDBC sampler – it worked.

Similarly, the menu system doesn’t allow assertions to be added as children of
the thread group, even through the “duration assertion”, for one, works fine at
that level.
